ComicInfo.Summary:
Tornado becomes the second and final comic to merge with 2000AD (after Starlord in 1978). Three Tornado stories join the line-up: Black Hawk, Wolfie Smith and Captain Klep.
The theme of Tornado was heroes. Black Hawk was a roman soldier, so the emphasis of the story changed once it moved to 2000AD and from the first episode the nubian is beamed aboard an alien spaceship and forced to fight alien creatures in a sci-fi stadium.
Cover: Dave Gibbons (Tharg, Big E, Wolfie Smith and Black Hawk)
Judge Dredd - Night of the Fog (John Wagner - Brian Bolland - Tom Frame)Black Hawk (part 1) (Alan Grant and Kelvin Gosnell - Massimo Belardinelli - Tom Frame)ABC Warriors - Steelhorn (part 1) (Pat Mills - Brendan MCarthy - Peter Knight)The Mind of Wolfie Smith - The Evil of Matthew Hobb (part 1) (Tom Tully - Ian Gibson - John Aldrich)Disaster 1990 (part 9) (Gerry Finley-Day - Carlos Pino - Jack Potter)Captain Klep (part 1) (Dave Angus - unknown)
